title: Layla Deen and the Case of the Ramadan Rogue
description: Layla and her family were just settling in to break a long days fast when the mother came running from the kitchen and cried, Someone took the food for Iftar! Layla knew it was a terrible crime and decided to get to the bottom of this mystery. Why would someone want to target her homes? Was it the three mean boys who live down the street? How can she catch the bad guys while staying out of trouble with her parents? See what happens! You ll be totally surprised!
author: Yahiya Emerick
